name: Teen Wolf (Season 2)
summary:
Scott（泰勒·珀西 Tyler Posey 饰）和Allison（克里斯塔尔·里德 Crystal Reed 饰）的关系转为底下，依然要处处防范Allison的父亲Argent（JR·波恩 JR Bourne 饰）。Jackson（科尔顿·海恩斯 Colton Haynes 饰）满心希望被Derek（泰勒·霍奇林 Tyler Hoechlin 饰）咬伤以后可以成为狼人，但鼻子总流出黑色液体，Derek提醒这是身体产生排斥。而他的女友Lydia（霍兰·罗登 Holland Roden 饰）被Derek（的叔叔咬伤以后似乎失去了一段记忆，人也变得奇怪起来。 
　　小镇连续发生凶手案，作案并非狼人，而是另一种不知明物种，会在杀人是会释放毒素。Scott、Derek和Argent一家都在寻找这个生物，而它总是先他们一步。到底这个物种是什么？Jackson变身会成功吗？Lydia的失忆背后又隐藏着怎样的秘密？

　　（简介转自豆瓣）

eps.name: Omega
eps.desc: Lydia vanishes from the hospital after a disturbing hallucination, and is found naked in the woods two days later. Isaac, a tormented teen abused by his father, is attacked while working in his father's cemetery; Derek appears to save him. Jackson begins bleeding black blood and is told by Derek that his body is resisting the bite. Derek forces Scott to watch Gerard kill an innocent werewolf and declare that they will eliminate all werewolves to avenge his daughter Kate's death.

eps.name: Shape Shifted
eps.desc: Isaac's father is murdered by a strange creature and Isaac is suspected. The Argent family removes the school principal and replaces him with Gerard. Scott senses another werewolf's presence on the lacrosse team and discovers that it is Isaac, who is taken into custody for his father's murder. When it is revealed that the hunters are going to kill Isaac, Scott, Stiles and Derek plan to save him, as he is innocent. In preparation for the full moon, Allison locks Scott in the basement freezer of Isaac's house, which Isaac's father had used as a chamber of abuse on Isaac. Upstairs, Allison sees the strange creature and screams, causing Scott to break out of the chamber. At the jail, Isaac transforms and breaks out, advancing on Stiles after killing a hunter. Derek, being the Alpha, is able to force Isaac into submission. Jackson, who had set up a video camera overnight to record his transformation, is upset to learn after watching the footage that nothing happened.

eps.name: Ice Pick
eps.desc: Chris begins Allison's training to become a hunter. At school, Erica, an epileptic girl, has a seizure and ends up in the hospital. There, Derek delivers the bite upon the promise that her illness will vanish. Lydia has disturbing hallucinations of Peter. Scott and Stiles notice that their classmate, Boyd, is missing, and determine that Derek must have recruited him. Dr. Deaton finds a dead hunter in his office and Chris wants him to find out what happened. Scott finds Boyd and is forced into a fight with Derek, Erica, and Isaac. It is revealed that Boyd already accepted the bite. As a frustrated Jackson is leaving the lacrosse field, his truck becomes stuck in the mud. When attempting to move it, he exhibits inhuman strength, leaving him shocked.

eps.name: Abomination
eps.desc: Dr. Deaton tells Scott that the Argents have information on the strange creature in a bestiary, and informs the Argents that the creature immobilizes its victims with a paralytic toxin substance coming from his nails. When Stiles takes his jeep in for repair, he is paralyzed by the creature's toxin and witnesses it kill the mechanic. Jackson discovers there are actually over 2 hours of missing footage from the night he recorded himself. At a lacrosse game, Scott sees Boyd's eyes become gold, revealing he is now a werewolf. While searching for the bestiary, Stiles is confronted by Derek and Erica. The creature attacks, paralyzing Derek. Derek falls into the pool and Stiles jumps in to save him. They discover the creature cannot swim, so they stay in the water. During a fight with Scott, the creature sees its own reflection and flees, making Derek realize that it is a Kanima. Gerard corners Scott and stabs him in front of the hospital, revealing that he knows Scott's secret. From there, Scott was forced to do whatever Gerard said so no harm comes to Scott's mother.

eps.name: Venomous
eps.desc: Derek attempts to find out if Jackson is the Kanima by having him swallow its toxin; it wouldn't be affected by its own poison. However, the attempt fails. Convinced that it is Lydia, since she displayed immunity to the creature's toxin, Derek wants to kill her, so he sends Isaac and Erica to do it. Scott, Allison, Stiles and Jackson try to protect her together. While Danny is restoring Jackson's missing camera footage, the video shows Jackson awakening with gold eyes. Jackson and Lydia reconcile after an argument and as they kiss, his neck turns scaly, revealing that he is the Kanima. Isaac and Erica break into the house but Scott, Allison and Stiles easily beat the two. Jackson, in Kanima form, appears just before Lydia comes out, revealing to everyone that it is him. The Kanima runs up to a car and touches hands against the window with a shadowy figure before seeing its reflection and fleeing.

eps.name: Frenemy
eps.desc: Derek engages the Kanima in a fight interrupted by Chris and Gerard; Chris is attacked by it. The Kanima does not attack Gerard, instead seeming to communicate with him, which confuses Chris. The Kanima then paralyzes Danny and six others at a gay club. Finding Jackson passed out, Stiles locks him up in a police van. Stiles suggests killing him, but Scott counters that Jackson is worth saving, as he had risked his life for them before. Jackson overhears this and starts to cry but quickly sees that he is transforming. Scott, Stiles and Allison then see that he has transformed and escaped. Lydia translates the Latin passage on the Kanima for Allison, which states that the Kanima seeks a master, ultimately concluding that Jackson is being controlled by someone.

eps.name: Restraint
eps.desc: The Kanima attacks a couple in the woods; the man is slain, but the woman is left alive when the Kanima notices she is pregnant. Jackson threatens Allison in a manner unlike his typical self when she goes to talk to him. A fight between Scott and Jackson, stopped by Erica and Stiles, lands everyone involved, including Matt, in detention. Erica informs Scott and Stiles that Jackson's birth parents were killed in a supposed traffic accident on June 14th; Jackson was born June 15th, meaning he had been pulled out of his dead mother's womb. Jackson transforms, injures Matt and Erica, and leaves a warning from his master. Erica has a seizure as a result of the Kanima's venom and Scott and Stiles rush her to Derek. Lydia meets the strange boy she has been seeing around, only for him to reveal himself to be a younger version of Peter Hale. Lydia realizes that Peter has been communicating with her via hallucination all along. The pregnant woman gives birth at the hospital but is shortly murdered by a hooded man.

eps.name: Raving
eps.desc: Jackson is commanded by his master to attend a secret rave, where his next target is the ticket seller. Stiles and Sheriff Stilinski realize there is a pattern in the murders: all victims had been in the class of 2006. Allison reveals to Chris that Jackson is the Kanima. Sheriff Stilinski tells Stiles he's been fired from the police force for Stiles' actions. At the rave, Scott, Isaac, and Erica infiltrate the dance floor to stop Jackson, while Stiles spreads mountain ash, a barrier for supernatural beings. Scott is attacked by Victoria, who attempts to kill him. Isaac drugs Jackson, and he and Erica join Stiles in interrogating his master, who speaks through him. The master reveals he's using Jackson to kill supposed murderers, who have apparently murdered him. Jackson transforms, killing the ticket-seller. Derek saves Scott, biting Victoria in the process. Victoria stumbles to Chris, revealing her wolfbite.

eps.name: Party Guessed
eps.desc: Peter tells Lydia that he must be resurrected on the next full moon, which is also Lydia's birthday. Stiles realizes that all the murder victims were on the Beacon Hills High swim team and the coach at the time was Isaac's father. Stiles and Scott figure the Kanima's master dislikes water. At Lydia's party, Lydia spikes the punchbowl with wolfsbane petals, causing all the party attendees to hallucinate the things they fear most. Using this opportunity, she walks out of the party unnoticed, attacks Derek and brings him to the Hale house, where Peter uses Derek's blood to come back to life. Matt is thrown into the pool but is saved by Jackson when he cries out that he cannot swim. Victoria must kill herself to protect her family before becoming a werewolf; with Chris's help, she stabs herself and dies. Allison is informed shortly of her mother's death. Scott sees a fuming Matt with the Kanima, revealing Matt is the Kanima's master.

eps.name: Fury
eps.desc: Scott, Stiles and Sheriff Stilinski finally get evidence to prove Matt is responsible for the murders, but Matt takes all three hostage, including Scott's mother, Melissa, when she arrives. Gerard persuades Allison to exact revenge on Derek for bringing her mother to commit suicide. Matt reveals to Scott his reason for the murders: in 2006, all the victims were at a party at Isaac's house, where Matt had come to meet Isaac. They had thrown Matt in the pool and left him to drown despite him yelling that he can't swim. Melissa finally sees Scott as a werewolf and cries in response, causing Scott to flee and run into Gerard. Gerard drowns Matt in the lake, with Peter secretly watching. Gerard then finds the Kanima and becomes its new master, shocking Peter, who leaves abruptly.

eps.name: Battlefield
eps.desc: Stiles speaks with Ms. Morrell, revealing that his father is again the sheriff. Boyd and Erica intend to join a new pack, terrified of the Argent werewolf genocide. Isaac warns Scott that Jackson will be at the championship lacrosse game, and also finds out that werewolves have the power to take away the pain of others. Peter explains to a distraught Derek that he knows how to save Jackson. At the game, Gerard threatens to murder someone via the Kanima if Scott does not bring Derek to him by the game's end. Scott, unable to act, welcomes help from Isaac. Chris and Allison chase Boyd and Erica; Allison ruthlessly shoots Boyd with arrows until the wolves are saved by Chris, who is upset by Allison's actions. Gerard intends to kill Isaac but when Isaac is saved by Scott, Gerard escapes. On the field, Stiles begins a massive winning streak, and their team wins. Just then, Jackson is found on the ground, bleeding and unresponsive; he has stabbed himself with his own claws. Melissa begins to try and revive him as Sheriff Stilinski makes a grim discovery: Stiles has gone missing.

eps.name: Master Plan
eps.desc: Stiles is kidnapped by Gerard, who also has Boyd and Erica hostage; Stiles is able to escape. Peter reveals that Jackson stabbing himself was part of Gerard's plan. Chris, realizing that Gerard is the true enemy, sets Boyd and Erica free, and helps Scott and Isaac take Jackson's body to Derek. Jackson turns into the Kanima, and a battle ensues. Gerard finally reveals his master plan: he has cancer and had planned to cure himself by becoming an Alpha werewolf. Derek bites Gerard but when Gerard's body rejects it, Scott explains why: he and Dr. Deaton had replaced Gerard's cancer pills with mountain ash. Lydia gets the Kanima to change back into Jackson, who allows Derek and Peter to kill him. However, he comes back to life as a blue-eyed werewolf. Allison apologizes and tearfully breaks up with Scott, but he assures her he'll wait. Isaac, Derek, and Peter find a cryptic symbol at the Hale house, which Peter explains is the symbol of the Alpha pack, a pack of Alpha werewolves, that has come to town, indicating new danger. This Alpha pack traps Boyd and Erica as they are fleeing, leaving their fate uncertain. Jackson later moves to London.
